# Paranoid Double Hash #

Double hash library in PHP made by paranoid

## Install ##

```bash
composer require paranoid/doublehash
```
## Test ##

```bash
git clone git@github.com:SiestaCat/paranoid-doublehash.git
cd paranoid-doublehash
composer install
composer run-script test
```

## Usage ##

```php
<?php
require_once "vendor/autoload.php";

use Paranoid\DoubleHash\DoubleHash;

echo DoubleHash::hash('i am paranoid');
```
Result:
